doc:
Audrey Marie Anderson https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Audrey_Marie_Anderson 0 Audrey Marie Anderson (born March 7, 1975) is an American actress and model. She is best known for her role as Kim Brown in the CBS action-drama series The Unit (2006–2009) and her recurring roles as Lyla Michaels in the Arrowverse, primarily Arrow (2013–present) and Lilly in The Walking Dead (2014). Audrey_Marie_Anderson ( born March_7_,_1975 ) is an_American_actress_and_model . She is_best_known for her_role as Kim_Brown in the_CBS_action-drama_series The_Unit_(_2006 – 2009_) and her_recurring_roles as Lyla_Michaels in the_Arrowverse , primarily Arrow_(_2013 – present_) and Lilly in The_Walking_Dead_(_2014_) .
